text: Ani jevha ibrahimaci tyancya palanakartyane aneka gostindvare kasoti ghetali ani tyanni sarva kasotyammadhye saphala ho'una dakhavile, tevha (allahane) pharmavile ki mi tumhala lokanca imama (pramukha) banavina. Vicarale, ani majhya santatila? Uttara dile ki majha vayada atyacari lokambabata(sathi) nahi
